sentences.en: Add a few drops of peppermint flavouring.
Add a spoonful of banana flavouring.
In addition , Luzhou - flavour liquor is required to have stronger aroma scent and prominent flavouring.
sentences.cn: 对浓香 型 白酒来说不仅需要如此,而且还要求窖香浓郁、陈香味突出.

sentences.en: Ingredients: water, almond, xyitol, emulsifier, sodium tripolyph - osphate, thickening agent, ace - k, flavouring essence.
sentences.cn: 配料: 水 、 杏仁 、 木糖醇 、 乳化剂 、 三聚磷酸钠 、 增稠剂 、 安赛蜜 、 食用香料.

sentences.en: Nutmeg is usually used as flavouring in food.
sentences.cn: 肉豆蔻常用作食物中的香料.

sentences.en: Retain the head of the shrimp as a flavouring for miso soup and other dishes.
sentences.cn: 列下的虾头可用来煮味噌汤,不要丢掉.

sentences.en: She likes flavouring dishes with chili oil.
sentences.cn: 她做菜很喜欢用辣椒油调味.

sentences.en: Soft drink: Nonalcoholic Beverage, usually carbonated, consisting of water ( soda water ), flavouring, and artificial sweetener.
sentences.cn: 软饮料: 不含酒精的饮料, 通常充有碳酸气, 含水 ( 苏打水 ) 、 香料和甜味剂.

sentences.en: The cook has put too much vanilla flavouring in this cake.
sentences.cn: 厨师在这块蛋糕里放了太多的香草调味料.

sentences.en: The other group was administered a placebo beverage containing artificial hibiscus flavouring and colour.
sentences.cn: 另一组喝安慰剂饮料,饮料里包含人工合成的芙蓉茶香精和色素.

sentences.en: Then fold in the rest of the sugar and flavouring.
sentences.cn: 然后加入剩下的糖和香料.

sentences.en: There is too much flavouring in the dish.
sentences.cn: 这个菜里调味品加得太多了.

sentences.en: This yoghurt contains no artificial flavouring or colouring.
sentences.cn: 这种酸乳酪不含人造香料或着色剂.

sentences.en: Toasted sesame oil A nutty - tasting oil used for flavouring. A little goes a long way.
sentences.cn: 烤蔴油一种坚果味道的油,用于调味. 一点点就可大见其效.

words.tran_cn: 有风趣的；有香味的；美味的；味浓的；可口的
无趣味的；[食品] 无味的

phrases.tran_cn: 调味剂；食用香料；增香剂

trans.tran_en: a substance used to give something a particular flavour or increase its flavour

trans.tran_cn: （加入香料、调味品等）给（某物）调味( flavour的现在分词 )
